title: Tropical Mint Nicotine Pouches By 77
description: TRY 77 TROPICAL MINT NICOTINE POUCHES Tropical Mint nicotine pouches by 77 offer the sweetness of tropical flavours and the cooling flavour of mint, and the combination of the two creates the perfect nicotine pouch. These pouches do not contain any tobacco and has a high level of nicotine, not meant for the newbie. View all 77 Pouches View all Fruity Pouches View all Mint/Menthol Pouches View all Extra Strong Pouches KEY FEATURES: 20MG Per Gram | 10MG Per Pouch Tropical Mint flavoured nicotine pouches Recommended for experienced users Tobacco-free, smoke-free and vapour-free 20 pouches in each can MORE ABOUT TROPICAL MINT FLAVOURED NICOTINE POUCHES When creating a nicotine pouch with more than one flavour, mint is the ideal flavour. Mint is compatible with everything, coffee, chocolate, fruit, berries, liquorice, candy etc. The list is endless, and every flavour becomes a little more interesting when compared with mint, no matter if it is sweet mint, menthol, spearmint, or peppermint. A flavour with such a versatile palate is destined to be delicious with everything. MORE ABOUT 77 NICOTINE POUCHES 77 were the first polish brand of tobacco-free nicotine pouches. 77 offers one of the most diverse ranges of flavour on the market, 77 also hit the sweet spot with their nicotine levels. Switch up, switch down, mix and match â€“ do whatever suits you best! Flavours range from different types of mint to peach, apple, strawberries, and even classic tobacco. Additional Description Information: Brand Name: 77Pouches Product Type: Nicotine Pouches Pouch Format: Large Our Strength Rating: Extra Strong Nicotine per Gram 20 MG Nicotine per Pouch 10 MG Flavour Name: Tropical Mint Flavour: Mint & Menthol Pouches per can: 20 Shipping from: London, UK
